projects.title: Project Vanguard
projects.summary: Three-track modernization across provisioning, identity, and compliance in healthcare.
highlights: Cut provisioning time with Autopilot and standardized baselines
Cloud-only Entra ID migration with staged Conditional Access
HIPAA/NIST-aligned policies and Secure Score uplift

projects.title: Toolbox – PowerShell
projects.summary: Reusable PowerShell utilities for Intune and Microsoft Graph with safe placeholders (<TENANT_ID>, <CLIENT_ID>, scopes).
highlights: Graph app auth helper with device code fallback
Export stubs for compliance and policy assignments
Report templates and simple logging utils

projects.title: IaC – Azure Bicep Modules
projects.summary: Reusable Bicep modules for multi-tenant deployments with parameterized naming (<ORG_NAME>-<APP_NAME>-<ENV>) and subscription-level orchestration.
highlights: Key Vault, Storage, Log Analytics, ACR, Container Apps env modules
Dev/Prod parameter files with safe placeholders
Validation workflow that builds all .bicep files

projects.title: AKS Production Baseline (Budget Lab)
projects.summary: Hands-on AKS deployment focused on production-style patterns with strict cost guardrails (deploy → validate → destroy).
highlights: Provisioned AKS with managed identity and attached ACR
Deployed workload + Service + NGINX ingress and validated external routing
Documented a teardown workflow to avoid ongoing compute and LB costs
